Data Fields
tmr_reqattr_t Struct Reference
Timer (TMR)

A Timer Channel (OC or IC) Request Data. More...

#include <tmr.h>

Collaboration diagram for tmr_reqattr_t:

Detailed Description

This structure is used when dealing with output compare or input capture channels request using tmr_ioctl().

Data Fields

tmr_action_channel_t channel
 The OC or IC channel.
 
uint32_t value
 The value to read or write.
